item.title: Gamedev
item.description: Zig is actively used for game development by both hobbyists for side projects, as well as a few seriously committed individuals who do Zig game development full time. Libraries and bindings exist for most things, and general purpose engines/frameworks/ecosystems are in early stages of development. item.title: The Zig Programming Language
item.description: Is Zig complete? No, Zig is still in heavy development. If you want to help us move forward faster, consider donating so that we can pay more contributors for their time. Is Zig made by a big tech company? No, Zig is supported by the Zig Software Foundation, a 501(c)(3) non-profit company. We will never concede board seats to any big tech company.
